name: Earth Destruction
description:
This is the entry of (6wrni Game Jam), theme is (Don't Touch The Ground) so this game is the challenge to drive rocket deep down to earth's core by avoiding platforms .. it's Apocalypse ..

Team Members: Only Me, Ahmad Nairat

Pre-Made Items : 

  •  UI Icons (most of them).
  •  Audio Manager Script.
  •  Camera Shaking.

Resources:

  • Trees, fences and Skybox :  BOXOPHOBIC
  • Rocket Body: before-eternity
  • SFX: Imphenzia.com
  • Music: Infraction
